text: Mani maaŋ mbuim, Fhe Bakɨme ana won siosan muun zav, won kɨna havharage ndi khɨngi niŋge thɨgi. Mba kɨniŋge thɨga havhargiap ki. Ana mba kɨniŋgen, ana kha kameŋ khergi, “Guma Bakɨme, ana won gumgi gu mbigi, ana mbe kaŋgi.” Ana vhɨra kha kameŋ khergi, “Mba za Guma Bakɨme zɨ ndigi gumgi, mbe kɨr tɨvi mbatɨgi ga segi.”
